original_title: Muhammad Ali vs. Ken Norton II
overview: On September 10, 1973, Ali and Norton met at the Forum, Inglewood, California, USA, for their highly anticipated rematch. Norton was in superb shape going into the second fight while Ali took to training at his training camp in Deer Lake, Pennsylvania, where he "sought to whip his once Adonis-like physique back into shape."
title: Muhammad Ali vs. Ken Norton II
